issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Fix #202207 viprow.nu
issue.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/202207

There's actually a script connection `https://lepomisprinted.shop/thRPFjI0rSrv5TNE/10879` which is blocked by

```adb
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z]{2}\.)?[0-9a-z]{5,16}\.[a-z]{3,7}\/[a-z](?=[a-z]{0,25}[0-9A-Z])[0-9a-zA-Z]{3,26}\/\d{4,6}(?:\?[_a-z]=[0-9a-z-]+)?$/$subdocument,script,xmlhttprequest,third-party,match-case
```

but I don't know if that rule works on reporter's browser (Chrome Mac)?

comment.body:
If I'm not wrong, the current rule for MV3 doesn't match the connections on this site:

```adb
/^https:\/\/[a-z]{2}\.[a-z]{7,14}\.com\/[a-z][0-9A-Za-z]{10,16}\/\d{4,6}$/$script,third-party,match-case
```

It works if I adjust to this regex:

```adb
/^https:\/\/(?:[a-z]{2}\.)?[a-z]{7,14}\.[a-z]{3,7}\/[a-z][0-9A-Za-z]{10,16}\/\d{4,6}$/$script,third-party,match-case
```

That regex is supported by MV3's `isRegexSupported` as far as I checked. I think we can use it?

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.iqiyi.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2F) ### Comment > 在https://www.iqiyi.com/封面右键元素里找到播放链接，如果AdGuard开启下面2项功就算把问题域名设为白名单世 > 不能解决问题 > 1,【"AdGuard URL跟踪过滤器 > 通过从URL中删除跟踪参数来增强隐私的过滤器。” > 2."Legitimate URL Shortener > 自动从URL中删除不必要的"$'和'&'值，使它们更容易从URL栏中复制并作为链接 > 粘贴到其他地方。已包含在Dandelion Sprout的防骚扰列表中。】" > 会导致爱奇艺视频网站不能正常打开。关闭AdGuārd打开元素里面复制的链接就正 > 常打开 > 这是我最喜欢的2个功希望能修复规则，同时网站也是最知名的视频网站 > > > > Find the playback link in the element.If AdGuard enables the > following two functions,even if the problem domain is > whitelisted,it cannot solve the problem > 1.AdGuard URL Tracking Filter > A privacy enhancing filter that removes tracking parameters > from URLs > 2.Legal URL Shorter > Automatically remove unnecessary '$and'&'values from > URLs,making them easier to copy from the URL bar and > paste as links elsewhere.Already included in Dandelion > Sprout's anti harassment list > It will cause the iQiyi video website to not open properly. > Close AdGuard and open the copied link in the element to > open it normally > These are my favorite 2 features that I hope can fix the rules. > and the website is also the most well-known video website ### Screenshots

pull_request.title: Fix omegascans.org ads
pull_request.body:
URL: https://omegascans.org/

They deliver `wpadmngr` ads scripts via 2 ways. Somehow `#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'EventTarget.prototype.addEventListener', '0x')` doesn't work on my side.

comment.body:
I'm not sure what should I check.
As far as I understand, there are 2 different ad scripts, as mentioned above both are added by `layout-` script, one is inline script another is `omegascans.org/ads.js`.
`#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'Date.prototype.toISOString', 'wpadmngr.com')` works fine for inline script on my end.
For `ads.js` this rule - `||omegascans.org/ads.js` works fine.
I guess it could be moved to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/BaseFilter/sections/specific.txt

For preventing loading ads/popups from `ads.js` we could use also:
```adblock
omegascans.org#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-write', 'Object.prototype.delayPop')
```
but I'm not sure if it's necessary.

pull_request.title: Fix omegascans.org ads
pull_request.body:
URL: https://omegascans.org/

They deliver `wpadmngr` ads scripts via 2 ways. Somehow `#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'EventTarget.prototype.addEventListener', '0x')` doesn't work on my side.

comment.body:
MV3 extension cannot update filters, so please add to user rules:
```adblock
foldrecipes.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'chp_ads_blocker_detector')
foldrecipes.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'pagead2.googlesyndication.com')
foldrecipes.com#%#//scriptlet('adjust-setInterval', '/proceed|mdtimer/', '*', '0.001')
```

comment.body:
> Я прикладывал журнал фильтрации. Он в том же сообщении, что и скрин с него.

Проверил тот файл - почему-то нет упоминаний HTML `ukranews.com`, будто вообще мимо Адгарда пролез. Сервер с сайтом использует HTTP/3 и такое возможно.
Скорее всего, это связано с этой проблемой: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForWindows/issues/5312
Можете попробовать обновиться на версию `nightly` (7.21.0) и проверить снова? 
Если после обновление переключитесь на релизный канал, при следующем обновлении версия обновится на релизную.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0530f7e4-a70a-433e-a714-c7cc358a650a)

pull_request.title: Fix omegascans.org ads
pull_request.body:
URL: https://omegascans.org/

They deliver `wpadmngr` ads scripts via 2 ways. Somehow `#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'EventTarget.prototype.addEventListener', '0x')` doesn't work on my side.

comment.body: Thanks. I've moved the network rule to specific file. I think scriptlet for `ads.js` is not needed now. We can wait if the site changes anything.

> Реклама в приложении autoru для андроид

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mpo.pch.com/path/VIPExit?tid=aad4cac7-c346-4e19-9c0d-ab2987fe1bb5&crmn=1MMVIP](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmpo.pch.com%2Fpath%2FVIPExit%3Ftid%3Daad4cac7-c346-4e19-9c0d-ab2987fe1bb5%26crmn%3D1MMVIP) ### Comment > Starting last week or so, Publishers Clearing House page auto-progression is broken with AdGuard turned on. Previously, having it on would block all ads and just cause the page to auto-progress (submitting your entry). Now it refuses to leave the page seen in the screenshots. All tested browsers with AdGuard on cause this problem. Turning it off in Opera assaults you with ads (and fixes the progression block), but turning it off in Safari doesn’t actually disable it. For whatever reason. Anyway, it’s a problem with the page not being fed the correct information to trick it into thinking “oh, he watched the ad; now I go to the next page.” ### Screenshots

pull_request.body:
URL: https://omegascans.org/

They deliver `wpadmngr` ads scripts via 2 ways. Somehow `#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'EventTarget.prototype.addEventListener', '0x')` doesn't work on my side.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
>I want to add a User rule on my Android phone from my laptop's Firefox browser extension and it's working fine on that device but for some reason it won't work on my Android phone. I made sure that the script is correct.

That's probably due to DNS filtering enabled.
To make it working it would be necessary to add also following rule to user rules in DNS filter:
```adblock
@@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com^
```
But the problem is that DNS filtering works system wide and rule cannot be specified to a website, so I do not recommend adding it.

I have added a different rule (filters update should be available in 1-2 hours) which should fixes it without necessity to unblock this request in DNS filter.
Or you can add this rule:
```adblock
kissanime.sx#%#//scriptlet('prevent-xhr', 'pagead2.googlesyndication.com')
```
to user rules.

> But on Proton Mail it isn't blocked because URL looks like this:

Well, they were based on the URL you provided - removed it.

> %3A%2F%2Fe.*%2Fopen%3F$image

So, is everything okay with that?
The original rule looks wide. @Yuki2718 I see that you changed it. Have you had any false positives with this? What about these?
```adblock
e.acct.epicgames.com/open?$image
e.acct.epicgames.com%2Fopen%3F$image
```

issue.title: www.tradingview.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

issue.body:
**Attention:**
If you encounter an ad blocker detection - please enable the pop-up filter in the Annoyances section. Or add the following rules to `User rules`:

```adblock
||securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=tradingview.com,important
tradingview.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'doubleclick.net')
```

If you encounter any other problem - continue creating the report.

---

**Внимание:**
Если вы столкнулись с обнаружением блокировщика рекламы - включите фильтр всплывающих окон в разделе Раздражителей. Либо добавьте следующие правила в пользовательский фильтр:

```adblock
||securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=tradingview.com,important
tradingview.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'doubleclick.net')
```

Если вы столкнулись с любой другой проблемой - продолжите создание отчёта.

comment.body: Thanks @Alex-302 , logging in now works if you [choose](https://www.asmr.one/settings) `mirror-200`, `latest` (which I believe is just `mirror-200`). Logging in still fails if one of the others is chosen. Do you mind adding all four domains that this site uses? AFAIK the four domains are `api.asmr.one`, `api.asmr-200.com`, `api.asmr-100.com` and `api.asmr-300.com`.

issue.title: www.tradingview.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

issue.body:
**Attention:**
If you encounter an ad blocker detection - please enable the pop-up filter in the Annoyances section. Or add the following rules to `User rules`:

```adblock
||securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=tradingview.com,important
tradingview.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'doubleclick.net')
```

If you encounter any other problem - continue creating the report.

---

**Внимание:**
Если вы столкнулись с обнаружением блокировщика рекламы - включите фильтр всплывающих окон в разделе Раздражителей. Либо добавьте следующие правила в пользовательский фильтр:

```adblock
||securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=tradingview.com,important
tradingview.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'doubleclick.net')
```

Если вы столкнулись с любой другой проблемой - продолжите создание отчёта.

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).
